title: Top part of touch screen non responsive when any app is open.
content:
Since the May update. I am facing a strange issue. 
When on home screen. Everything works. I'm able to interact with the full touch screen and access the notification panel.

As soon as I open any app. The top 1 cm of the touch panel becomes unresponsive. I can't access the notifications panel or interact with any button in that space. Like if I open chrome. I can't click on address bar or the refresh button etc...

If I change view to landscape. Everything with work except the 1cm area to the extreme left.

I feel this is a bug.

Please help as I love this phone.
